setDetails.setDescription:
Zer0range is a digital asset index designed to track underlying assetâ€™s performance within the Crypto industry. Zer0range Index takes the best and most liquid Blockchains, Data, Web3, De-Fi and Metaverse assets available on the Polygon network and encompasses them into one investable asset, ZER0.

Objective: We aim to track projects majorly in Standard Blockchains, Data, Web3, De-Fi and Metaverse assets that have significant usage and upside with a team committed to growth and development.

Index Maintenance: Index is maintained every month. Addition and removal of any underlying assets will be made based on the research.
setDetails.managerDescription: Zer0range is a team of two investors who prioritise research, fundamentals and the team behind each project which exhibits huge upside potential at the moment as well as in the coming future. We recommend making investments for the long term since Blockchain, Data, Web3, De-Fi and Metaverse are still in the nascent phase of infrastructure development, once they mature the investments that were made over a while also compounds gradually.
